Race.SummaryText:
PARISHWIDE PROPOSITION
(TAX CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 2.07 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR IMPROVING, MAINTAINING, OPERATING AND SUPPORTING THE EVANGELINE PARISH PUBLIC HEALTH UNIT.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Evangeline, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to continue to levy a two and seven hundredths (2.07) mills tax (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $253,805) on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purpose of improving, maintaining, operating and supporting the Evangeline Parish Public Health Unit?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road District No. 1 -- 5.26 Mill - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
ROAD DISTRICT NO. 1 PROPOSITION
(TAX CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 5.26 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION FOR CONSTRUCTING AND IMPROVING PUBLIC ROADS AND HIGHWAYS WITHIN THE DISTRICT, OR FOR THE MAINTENANCE THEREOF.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 1 of the Parish of Evangeline, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy a five and twenty-six hundredths (5.26) mills tax (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $337,871) on all the property subject to taxation within the District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of constructing and improving public roads and highways within the District, or for the maintenance thereof?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road District No. 2 -- 15.28 Mill - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
ROAD DISTRICT NO. 2 PROPOSITION
(TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 15.28 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR CONSTRUCTING AND IMPROVING PUBLIC ROADS AND HIGHWAYS WITHIN THE DISTRICT, OR FOR THE MAINTENANCE THEREOF.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District 2 of the Parish of Evangeline, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a fifteen and twenty-eight hundredths (15.28) mills tax (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $215,280) on all the property subject to taxation within the District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of constructing and improving public roads and highways within the District, or for the maintenance thereof?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road District No. 5 -- 5.07 Mill - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
ROAD DISTRICT NO. 5 PROPOSITION
(TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 5.07 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR CONSTRUCTING AND IMPROVING PUBLIC ROADS AND HIGHWAYS WITHIN THE DISTRICT OR THE MAINTENANCE THEREOF.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 5 of the Parish of Evangeline, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a five and seven hundredths (5.07) mills tax (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $76,440) on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purpose of constructing and improving public roads and highways within the District or for the maintenance thereof?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Prot. Dist. No. 2 -- 5.63 Mill - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
FIRE PROTECTION DISTRICT NO. 2 PROPOSITION
(TAX CONTINUATION)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 5.63 MILLS PROPERTY TAX CONTINUATION, THE CITY OF VILLE PLATTE EXCEPTED, FOR ACQUIRING, CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING FIRE PROTECTION FACILITIES IN THE DISTRICT, INCLUDING THE PURCHASE OF FIRE TRUCKS AND EQUIPMENT THEREFOR, AND THE PAYMENT OF FIREMEN'S SALARIES.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 2 of the Parish of Evangeline, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy a special tax of five and sixty-three hundredths (5.63) mills (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $187,091) on all the property subject to taxation in the District, the City of Ville Platte excepted, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2009 and ending with the year 2018, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating fire protection facilities in the District, including the purchase of fire trucks and equipment therefor, and the payment of Firemen's salaries?
